testcase.name: Verify the viewing of columns
testcase.summary: Verifies if the columns are modifiable;
testcase.preconditions:
User must be logged in the system;

Have various campaign registered in the system;

step.actions: Hover over the campaign icon on the main menu;
step.expectedresults: System shows a description of the campaign and some options;

step.actions: User click in option "List of campaign";
step.expectedresults: System opens the campaign list with all columns;
System opens various marked checkbox;
System uncheck the status and removes the "Status" column of campaign list;
System unchek the status and removes the "Content" column of campaign list;

step.actions: Uncheck the "Shedule date and time" checkbox;
step.expectedresults: System uncheck the "Schedule date and time" and removes the "Schedule date and time" column of campaign list;

step.actions: Uncheck the "Creation date and time" checkbox;
step.expectedresults: System unchek the "Creation date and time" and removes the "Creation date and time" column of campaign list;

step.actions: Uncheck the "Name of email blast" checkbox;
step.expectedresults: System uncheck the "Name of email blast" and removes all columns and does not show no campaign;

step.actions: Check the "Name of email blast" checkbox;
step.expectedresults: System selects the "Name of email blast", adds the column "Name of email blast" in the list and showing the campaigns;
System selects the "Status" and "Content", adds the columns "Status" and "Content" in the list and showing campaigns;

step.actions: Check the "Creation date and time" and "Schedule campaign" checkboxs;
step.expectedresults: System selects the "Creation date and time" and "Schedule campaign", adds the columns "Creation date and time" and "Schedule campaign" in the list and showing campaigns;
